title: High spec mountain bike for sale (bicycle)
text:
A GT 6061 MTB specific bicycle in extremely good condition. It was custom ordered from London and has top of the range features. Such as juicy three brake systems, shimano deore dual gears, GT 6061 mtb specific handles, a GT triple triangle frame, enhanced suspension (fit for any weight) and bottle holders. 

The tyres have good tread and the bicycle runs perfectly. Reason for selling: I don’t ride anymore. This is a perfect bike for anyone from larger children to adults doing serious mountain biking and races.

title: 2021 GIANT TALON E+29ER 1 TRAIL BIKE
text: The trail is calling, and here’s how to answer. This balanced, smooth-riding E-bike gives you a natural-feeling boost of power and total control, so you can have more fun and expand your off-road riding capabilities.With a lightweight aluminum frame that blends classic hardtail design with modern E-bike technology, Talon E+ 29 delivers comfort and confidence on off-road terrain. Perfect for bike paths or XC trails, it features a SyncDrive Core motor system that makes those hard climbs easier and encourages you to extend your ride time. It’s designed for a 100mm suspension fork to smooth out the bumps, and its 29-inch wheels give it a stable, balanced ride quality. The side-release EnergyPak battery is integrated into the frame and can be easily removed for charging. title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: 2021 GIANT STANCE E+2 29ER
text: Steep climbs, technical descents, longer days on the trail. With a smooth suspension setup and a seamless boost of pedaling support, this E-bike gives you the power and technology to ride the trails you dream about.Designed with trail-friendly geometry, Stance E+ helps beginner or intermediate trail riders experience off-road E-bike riding at its best. Its lightweight, strong and stiff ALUXX SL aluminum frame with FlexPoint suspension makes tricky singletrack trails easier to ride. It features 120mm of rear suspension travel and 130mm up front, plus the stable, nimble ride quality of 29-inch wheels. The SyncDrive Sport motor delivers 350 percent tunable support ratios through the Giant E-bike App. The new RideControl ONE with EVO display compatibility has integrated handlebar support buttons for improved ergonomic control. title: Rent an Electric Mountain Bike - Hout Bay, Constantia, Camps Bay
text:
Electric Mountain Biking with Cape Lion e-Rides offers the most e-xciting way to get around mountain biking trails this summer - e-MTB! If you are new to e-biking, it's like cycling, but without the grind. 
E-MTBs offer a little more push uphills and little more fun on the downhills. If you haven't tried it yet, what are you waiting for?
Discover the trails of Constantia, Silvermine, Table Mountain National Park and more.

title: 20” STEP THROUGH FATTIE WOW EBIKE - R49,850.00 VAT Inclusive
text:
This nimble and manoeuvrable little electric bike is
super easy to get on and off as a result of its step-through frame design and
just as easy to ride and control even for smaller and younger riders. The front
basket and rear carrier also make it a very practical vehicle for moving small
loads from personal attire to groceries and can even fit a baby seat to the
rear.

Bike is fitted with: 

·        
High efficiency 750W brushless geared rear hub
electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 85Nm of ample torque. 

·        
A 21Ah 48V Samsung cell which doesn’t build up
memory and up to 100% larger capacity than the norm and increases range
significantly. 

·        
A 25A heavy duty intelligent controller provides
motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent parameter
setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time

·        
10 Speed long range drive train provides a
suitable gear selection for any possible terrain. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface including the beach.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge 

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

This is a rugged South African designed, tested, and
manufactured EBIKE 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qMvyiqcSd3s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dfJQNoXzuTg

text:
COMMERCIAL
ETRIKE R54,850.00 VAT Inclusive

 

This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

Trike is fitted with. 

·        
a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque. 

·        
It comes standard with a maximum size 21Ah 48V
Samsung Lithium Ion battery pack which doesn’t build up memory and increases
range significantly. 

·        
The 25A heavy duty intelligent controller
provides motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent
parameter setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time and the 8 Speed drive train provides a suitable gear range
for its application. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

title: Silverback Stride SE 17.5” Mountain Bike
text:
Used but excellent condition 2012 Silverback Stride SE mountain bike - ideal for beginner. Includes Concept Dual Ride cleat pedals.

Full specifications as follows:

Bottom bracket	  VP Components
Brakes	  Silverback Concepts V-Brake
Cassette	Shimano MFZ-21 14-28T
Crankset	Suntour 28/38/48T

Features	
Butted frames made from 6061 Aluminium Alloy with added Magnesium to be strong , light and durable. Frame has integrated headset and disc brake ready frame, forks and wheels for easy future upgrade on models without hydraulic disc brakes. SBC components used to enforce design concept and bring refined quality to user’s control points. Low tread tyres for better, faster rolling. Replaceable dropout Hangers. Wide low -riser bars increase rider comfort, control and leverage over big wheels in extreme terrain while keeping the setup at a decent height for climbing. Forks equipped with manual lockout feature for better efficiency during uphill efforts or sprints. Stainless steel spokes. Double wall rims.

Fork type	Silverback Concepts 60mm
Frame type	Aluminium
Front derailleur	Shimano TZ-Series
Hub front	Silverback Concepts Steel QR
Hub rear	Silverback Concepts Steel QR
Pedals	 Concept DualRide
Rear derailleur	Shimano TX-Series
Recommended for	MTB Recreation
Rims type	Aluminium Rims
Shifters	Shimano RevoShift 21 Speed
Tires	CST 26" x 1.95

Bike was only used a few times, and serviced once by Evobike Durbanville, so is in excellent working condition.

text:
"The Rockrider 520 27.5 is built on an Evo tech aluminium frame. This comfort frame geometry is actually the perfect blend of comfort and aggressiveness, that is needed to tackle trails." 

- XL Lightweight Alu frame, but like newer XL frames, the top bar is not that high
Measures 50/52cm BB to seatpost clamp
Can easily pass as a large
Seat set up high for my height currently
- 3 by 8 Gears 
- SRAM Components 
- TEKTRO Aluminum brake levers to operate the front and rear Hayes MX5 mechanical disc brakes
" The 80mm front suspension fork comes with a preload weight adjuster, which is useful for riders looking to optimize the suspension travel according to their weight." 
Awesome matt Black and Blue colour 
In very good condition with a few minor scuffs/scratches from normal use, nothing major
Extras - bottle holder and saddle bag
Cleaned, lubed and tweaked at Decathlon about a month ago

Reluctant sell and didn't really want to sell, but only for another bike I wanted. That unfortunately sold, but that changed my head space as I do have too many bikes and don't want to miss out on something similar that I wanted to buy. 
Very reasonably priced and 27.5s are scarce
Cash upon collection only
Not really negotiable as this is 60% of what the new price was
I'm from Roodepoort near Westgate Shopping Centre 
Can contact me through the app, WhatsApp msg or call, phone, but please don't SMS. 
Available as long as the ad is up

title: ELECTRIC BIKES COMPLETE E-MTB BUILT IN S.A OR CONVERT YOUR MTB TO ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikes built in SA . We personalize e-bikes for people by focusing on one's desired riding experience. E-bikes individually built to satisfy different forms of adventure or exercise. Custom-built E-bikes designed for Farm roads,beaches,sand dunes, mountains or road. And the conversion of existing bicycles to electric to ensure the perfect combination of comfort and power to optimize your performance.Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.E-bikes built one at a time to ensure each person's individual needs are met for :1. Type of terrain.2. Torque.3. Speed.4. Range.5. Frame size.6. Weight.7. Riding preferences .Specialized e-bikes built for different types of exploration and performance - Fishing adventures, coastal beach riding, mountains and river beds, farm jeep tracks, forest trails , downhill , single tracks . Whether it's a hardtail or soft tail full susp our team custom-builds e-bikes for people's specific needs.We 1st find out what'll suit you best:Your weight ( for right e-bike motor system)Your height ( right frame size )Your own individual riding preferences for comfort ( saddle, handlebars , stem , pedals ) and convenience (carriers,bags,gear/accessories)WHAT WE LEARNT AFTER 15 YEARS OF CONVERTING BICYCLES TO ELECTRIC:1. SUPPORTS SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused.Why not turn it into adventures and a new desire to ride again?Make valuable use of something that already exists by upgrading it to an electric bicycle.2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONYour bicycle professionally converted to electric by a team who has over 10 years experience in electric bike building over 30 years in bicycle building and servicing .In 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued using our quality Int'l EU standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.Careful consideration of your weight, height, terrain and riding preferences and with our guidance you get to choose right from the start the power and range that best suits you.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintainand service your e-bike.Your e-bike is compatible with most batteries and bicyle components in the market and therefore when it comes to the time when you need to replace anything you have a wider choice.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeBRANCHES IN CAPE TOWN AND JOHANNESBURG.

title: WOWeBIKE COMMERCIAL ETRIKE R54,850.00 VAT Inclusive
text:
This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

Trike is fitted with. 

·        
a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque. 

·        
It comes standard with a maximum size 21Ah 48V
Samsung Lithium Ion battery pack which doesn’t build up memory and increases
range significantly. 

·        
The 25A heavy duty intelligent controller
provides motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent
parameter setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time and the 8 Speed drive train provides a suitable gear range
for its application. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

 

This is a rugged South
African designed, tested, and manufactured EBIKE

title: 2010 GT Sensor small frame  27.5"(converted)
text:
2 x9 Groupset. 
Tubeless
WTB 27.5" rims

Fork and shock serviced within last 500km
Bike has been used, but in very good condition.
Perfect for a kid who wants to get onto a small frame dual sus bike or for someone who of small stature who wants a dual sus, bit does not want to spend a lot. 

I am personally a big fan of the I drive suspension geometry and have had 0 maintenance needs on this - it is still perfect. Coupled with the Fox fork and shock, it offers a very plush ride. Biggest plus is short, technical climbs. Biggest neg is probably that it is a bit more nervous going down hill (I enjoyed it though) and mud clearance. 

Serious offers will be considered.

title: 2021 SCOTT SPARK 900 TEAM ISSUE (LARGE)
text:
Selling my 2021 Scott spark 900 Team Issue.  The bike is in mint condition. Had it for a year, but havent used it alot and also never dropped it. Scratches are very very minimal, with actually just one (about 1cm) on the side because of a bike rack in December. 

Tyres are tubeless ready and ready to go. 
Casette is in mint condition. Have never felt that it slipped on me. I also put on a new chain to protect the teeth of the casette. 

The Lyne dropper post is also quite new. Still works perfectly. I do sell it for an extra R2500 if you are interrested. I also do not sell the cleats with the bike

The shocks are also in great condition and have never had a leak. The Spark 2021 comes with a twin-lock system meaning it can lock the front and back suspention at the same time. Has 3 modes. 

Like I said, the bike is very close to brand new on the way it looks and hasnt been used alot. 

Tyres still have 90-85% to go

title: E-Bike - COMMERCIAL ETRIKE
text:
This electric powered work horse is ideal for commercial
movement of small loads and suitable to any size business wanting to increase
profits and decrease pollution. Rider height is high for maximum visibility and
front suspension fork ensures ride comfort on any terrain. It is allowed to
ride safely out of the traffic in dedicated cycling lanes and an excellent
choice as any light delivery vehicle. It’s also suitable to pull application
specific trike trailer.

Trike is fitted with. 

·        
a high efficiency 750W brushless geared front
hub electric motor with a reduction ratio of 1:5 and 80 Nm of ample torque. 

·        
It comes standard with a maximum size 21Ah 48V
Samsung Lithium Ion battery pack which doesn’t build up memory and increases
range significantly. 

·        
The 25A heavy duty intelligent controller
provides motor and controller temperature protection as well as intelligent
parameter setting. 

·        
All round hydraulic disc brakes assure safe
stopping every time and the 8 Speed drive train provides a suitable gear range
for its application. 

·        
Fat tyres on double wall rims give excellent
traction on any surface.

·        
Range 60 Kilometres on a 5-hour charge

·        
Free delivery in South Africa

 

This is a rugged South
African designed, tested, and manufactured EBIKE                              

 

Mobile:
072 869 0153

just as easy to ride and control even for smaller and younger riders. The front
basket and rear carrier also make it a very practical vehicle for moving small
loads from personal attire to groceries and can even fit a baby seat to the
rear.

·

setting.

stopping every time

title: Contact me for what bicycle fits you best
text:
Don't end up buying a bike and needing to buy again after a few months because you didn't know what to get. 

Are you looking to buy a Mountain bike, yet unsure of what to look for? 

Or have you bought one and doesn't feel comfortable, maybe a bit slack or to twitchy. 

Is your back hurting a lot, hands getting numb and upper legs cramping in early stages of exercise?

Are you comfortable on your bike?

I advise on multiple aspects, resell value, desired brands, style and size. 

Some types and styles are more adequate for certain terrains and environments!

Before you buy something you don't know enough about, send me your desired bike, the daily use or styles you'd like to endeavor and i can confirm that it's a good choice or if a different bicycle would be more suitable. 

And list some reason why it's not suitable and why you shouldn't buy it and rather revert to a different bicycle all together. 

This service is free and we will book a meeting or just talk over the phone. Or at a local area, my or your house and we will discuss in person (with a social distancing aspect) why, why not and what rather with examples. 

Mr Elezar Kruger 
0659880098 
Or email 
Eleckruger@gmail.com 

Kind regards
Elezar
